metadata.title: CVE-2022-4543 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw named "EntryBleed" was found in the Linux Kernel Page Table Isolation (KPTI). This issue could allow a local attacker to leak KASLR base via prefetch side-channels based on TLB timing for Intel systems.

criterions.comment: linux package in kinetic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023.01.10').
linux-allwinner package in kinetic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
linux-aws package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.

linux-oem-5.17: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needs-triage').
